root.name: EverQuest: Rain of Fear
root.description: OverviewRain of Fear continues the story arc that began with House of Thule and continued through Veil of Alaris. After defeating the Triumvirate, the power of fear has returned to Norrath via shards that have rained down upon the world. Regaining these shards will take players to new lands as well as revisiting lands, such as Velious, that have long since been ignored. Many old encounters from years ago will be revamped due to the shards being found by key characters throughout Norrath.FeaturesLevel cap increased to 100.Aggro Meter allows players to actually see how close they are to gaining the attention of an enemy mid-fight.New Collection/Hunter tasks that reward players with new titles.Autonomous Brokering finally allows players to leave their vendor active in The Bazaar while offline.
